testcase.name: The user adds a new customer without filling First Name field - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user accesses the main page.......................................passed When The user clicks on the 'Bank Manager Login' button.....................passed And The user clicks on the 'Add Customer' button............................passed And The user writes 'first name' "".........................................passed And The user writes 'last name' "Craciun"...................................passed And The user writes 'post code' "E23564"....................................passed And The user clicks on submit add customer button...........................passed Then The user gets the alert banner in field First Name "Please fill out this field.".passed

testcase.name: The user adds a new customer without filling Last Name field - Example #1.1
testcase.system-out: Given The user accesses the main page.......................................passed When The user clicks on the 'Bank Manager Login' button.....................passed And The user clicks on the 'Add Customer' button............................passed And The user writes 'first name' "Cosmin"...................................passed And The user writes 'last name' ""..........................................passed And The user writes 'post code' "E23564"....................................passed And The user clicks on submit add customer button...........................passed Then The user gets the alert banner in field Last Name "Please fill out this field.".passed
